abstract: Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian technology firm with a major stake in Facebook, has selected Goldman Sachs for its initial public offering, a source with direct knowledge of the matter said Thursday.
snippet: Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian technology firm with a major stake in Facebook, has selected Goldman Sachs for its initial public offering, a source with direct knowledge of the matter said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian technology firm with a major stake in Facebook, has selected Goldman Sachs for its initial public offering, a source with direct knowledge of the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Digital Sky Technologies Chooses Goldman for I.P.O.
